content: designed with soft velvet yarn perfect if you are looking for something quick to make for markets skill level easy this pattern is in a pdf format and you will need adobe reader to open it adobe reader is free to download stitch abbreviations and terms mc magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet pattern explanation this pattern is written using us terms the pdf file has pictures included with descriptions the number of stitches at the end of each row is indicated in the brackets use a stitch marker to indicate the beginning of a new row tools and materials approximately the following alize velluto yarn soft velvet yarn - 20g of main yarn colour - 8mm safety eyes - poly-fill stuffing - 6 0mm crochet hook - tapestry needle please follow me on social media i d love to follow you back have you made this pattern i d love to see your beautiful work please tag my page crochet creations by corinne
